Title: Peng Liyuan
Publisher: Zhongguo duiwai yanchu gongsi (中国对外演出公司)
Notes: The text under the poster translated in English:Peng LiyuanFamous Chinese soprano, representative of Chinese contemporary vocal folk music, noted researcher of vocal folk music, also a famous military singer who is beloved by audiences within and outside of the army, first-class national performer, head of the Chinese People's Liberation Army General Political Department Song and Dance Troupe. Her signature songs are 'Xiwang de tianye shang', 'Erquan yang yue', 'Zhuxiu langma' and others.China Performing Arts Agency
